mapper.sql: id, industry, work_type, qualified_score, total_score, exam_time, operate_time, operator, operator_ip
mapper.insert:
insert into exam_subject
id,
industry,
work_type,
qualified_score,
total_score,
exam_time,
operate_time,
operator,
operator_ip,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{industry,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{workType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{qualifiedScore,jdbcType=REAL},
#{totalScore,jdbcType=REAL},
#{examTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{operatorIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update exam_subject
industry = #{industry,jdbcType=INTEGER},
work_type = #{workType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
qualified_score = #{qualifiedScore,jdbcType=REAL},
total_score = #{totalScore,jdbcType=REAL},
exam_time = #{examTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator_ip = #{operatorIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update exam_subject set industry = #{industry,jdbcType=INTEGER}, work_type = #{workType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, qualified_score = #{qualifiedScore,jdbcType=REAL}, total_score = #{totalScore,jdbcType=REAL}, exam_time = #{examTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator_ip = #{operatorIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT a.*,b.name as work_type_name,(SELECT count(1) FROM (SELECT a.subject_id from exam_subject_topic as a INNER JOIN exam_topic_bank as b on a.topic_id = b.id where b.type = 1 ) as b WHERE b.subject_id = a.id ) as judgement_number, (SELECT count(1) FROM (SELECT a.subject_id from exam_subject_topic as a INNER JOIN exam_topic_bank as b on a.topic_id = b.id where b.type = 2 ) as b WHERE b.subject_id = a.id ) as single_number, (SELECT count(1) FROM (SELECT a.subject_id from exam_subject_topic as a INNER JOIN exam_topic_bank as b on a.topic_id = b.id where b.type = 3 ) as b WHERE b.subject_id = a.id ) as multiple_number,(SELECT count(1) FROM exam_subject_topic where subject_id = a.id) as topic_number FROM (SELECT a.*,b.name as industry_name FROM exam_subject as a LEFT JOIN sys_industry as b on a.industry =b.id limit #{page.offset}, #{page.pageSize}) as a LEFT JOIN sys_work_type as b on a.work_type = b.id
